Pay in a snap, Get it from your banking app.

Deal is a fast, safe and easy way to send money in minutes to your friends and family. Look for it in your banking app.

How it works

How to send money with Deal app.

Acces Deal App

Get started by enrolling your email or mobile number through your mobile banking app or with the Deal app.

Learn more
Pick a person to pay

Enter the prefered email address or mobile number of the recipient. You can send money to almost anyone.

Learn more
Choose the amount

Enter the amount to send. Your recipient gets a notification explaining how to complete the payment, simply.

Learn more
Get started with your bank or credit union.
The Real Money Moves

Deal is a fast, sa fe and easy way to send money in minutes to your friends and family.
Look for it in your banking app.
